features: Made with soft 85% organic cotton/15% polyester French terry
Sits on the waist with a regular rise; relaxed fit in the hips/seat/thighs; cut straight to the ankle; best for athletic and muscular body types and larger frames
Two slanted pockets and one right-rear pocket
Internal drawstring at the waistband lets you personalize the fit
Soft rib-knit-trim at the cuffs feels comfortable and easy on the skin
Fair Trade Certified™ sewn, which means the people who made them earned a premium for their labor
